prompts: Create a dinosaur-like Pokemon with a fierce expression and sharp teeth.
I want a robust dragon Pokemon that has a mix of earthy and fiery colors.
Generate a powerful Pokemon resembling a T-Rex with spiky features and a strong stance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies strength and ferocity, complete with jagged spines and a roaring mouth.
Imagine a prehistoric Pokemon with a vibrant palette and a menacing glare.
Design a Pokemon inspired by ancient reptiles, featuring unique textures and colors.
Give me a Pokemon that looks both intimidating and majestic, with a strong build and striking colors.
